howItWorks.headline: From Detection to Action: The Community Decides, the Ocean Revives.
howItWorks.subheadline: Bluezz connects technology and community governance to clean the oceans with radical transparency. Here, you don't just donate—you decide.

1.title: 1. AI-Powered Detection
1.description: Our artificial intelligence monitors the oceans 24/7, identifying large plastic clusters and oil spills with high precision.

2.title: 2. Public & Community Tender
2.description: Once a problem is identified, we open a public tender on the platform. Companies and organizations apply to perform the cleanup, submitting their plans and budgets.

3.title: 3. Voting & Crowdfunding
3.description: The Bluezz community funds the operation and votes for the project they deem most efficient and trustworthy. Every dollar donated is a vote.

4.title: 4. Transparent Execution & Real-Time Auditing
4.description: Goal reached? The funds are transferred to the executor on the same day. The entire process is auditable, with real-time updates and reports.

5.title: 5. Open-Source Governance
5.description: Bluezz is yours. All our rules, finances, and code are open and auditable on GitHub. The community governs.
